name: Beyond the Shadows
description:
Game pad and headset highly recommended

                                                                                                                                

Beyond the Shadows is an adventure platformer where you are followed by an entity through an ancient city. The light is on your only ally to stay alive.

  • Genre: Platformer, Adventure, Escape, Spooky
  • Engine: Unreal Engine 5
  • Duration: 6 weeks

                                                                                                                                

/!\ Important /!\

The game remains as a school project and is published as a tech demo.
